DOC.brief_summary: Using double blind , randomize control design study short-term therapeutic effect customize arch-support shoe insole child flat foot .
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Effects Customized Insoles Children With Flat Foot
DOC.detailed_description: A total 52 child flat foot collect . The participant randomize two group , include study group ( insole group ) control group ( without insole group ) . All participant insole group evaluate baseline , customize full-length shoe insole prescribe . All evaluation , include physical functional ability , balance , physical activity , functional performance , quality life re-evaluated 12 week shoe insole wear insole group . The control group evaluate baseline 12 week .
